::DrillBit::

DrillBit sees the optics coming at him. He jumps to the right, trying to
take cover. The jumping causes Enfectra's right eye beam to miss, but
the other hit DrillBit's left foot. He lands out of the line of fire.
"Outch! Damn maximals! When is this going to end?"
